channel.title: learn on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in learn on A Hugo website

item.title: Git help
item.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system. working directory. staging area(index). git repository. three different objects generate from git cmd and describe in Hash: blob: only save the content of the file instead the file name. tree: the file name. commit: the first commit also called root commit. git basic git init: generate a file called /.git/ used ls -a to see all the hided files.

item.title: Blog Down
item.description: get start: hugo go: config Content Front matter Templates _default/list.html: terms.html Partials/ .stores the templates reused in other html pages by the {{ partial }} function. footer.html Custom layouts Static files Lastly Addin â€¦. get start: here we go. already started hugo go: a tool we we can leverage to generate the static website. The layout below follows my master

item.title: SQL
item.description: DEFINATION OF RELATION TABLES HOW TO CHANGE THE ENTITY TO A SCHEMAS CASE WHEN SUBQUERY COMMON TABLE EXPRESS (cte) WINDOW FUN ROLLUP and CUBE TABLESAMPLE UNPIVOT:ROW TO COLUMN PIVOT:COLUME TO ROW Some information contains from Datacamp, you can use my refer to get started and learn new technique together. DEFINATION OF RELATION TABLES entity: (table) the object store the information attribute: column in a table to describe the part of the information
